name: Mystery Blocks
description:
Made in fall of 2016 for a midterm, it makes a good little prototype as well!

Certain blocks kill you, others will not, every time you die the blocks that hurt you change! You need the key to leave each room. Help the pirate escape this bizarre maze. 3 short levels! Star blocks act as checkpoints!

Controls: Arrow Keys to move, Spacebar to Jump

Design, Programming, and Music done by Me

Pirate Art: https://opengameart.org/content/classic-pirate-captain-animated

Map Tileset: https://opengameart.org/content/simple-broad-purpose-tileset

Made in Unity.
